event.title: took place further south on the eastern border of what is now

data.event: Much of the early conflict took place further south on the eastern border of what is now Shewa.

event.title: arrived at port of Massawa on February 10, 1541

data.event: The Ethiopians were forced to ask for help from the Portuguese who arrived at port of Massawa on February 10, 1541.

event.title: April of 1542 the two armies met

data.event: In April of 1542 the two armies met north of Lake Ashenge (near Korem in Tigray).
